lu.softec.maven.mavenizer.analyzer
Interface ClassWalkListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractClassWalkListener, AbstractClassWalkVisitorListener, ClassWalkDependencyVisitorListener, ClassWalkInventoryVisitorListener
public interface ClassWalkListener

Interface that should be implemented for listening ClassDirectoryWalker events

Method Summary
 void debug(java.lang.String s)
          Called when a debug message is issued
 void libraryWalkFileClosed()
          Called for each walked file after the file has been closed.

          Called for each file that is walked through for finding classes
 void libraryWalkFinished()
          Called once when a walk is finished

          Called for each classe found

Method Detail

libraryWalkStarted

void libraryWalkStarted(java.io.File file)
Called once when a walk is started.

Parameters:
file - the base directory that is about to be walked

libraryWalkFileOpened

void libraryWalkFileOpened(int progress,
                           java.io.File file)
Called for each file that is walked through for finding classes

Parameters:
progress - the approximative percentage of progress in the file list behing walked
file - the file that is about to be walked

libraryWalkProcessClass

void libraryWalkProcessClass(int progress,
                             java.io.InputStream in)
Called for each classe found

Parameters:
progress - the approximative percentage of progress in the current walked file. For .class file, always 100%.
in - an input stream to read the class bytecode. This stream SHOULD NEVER be closed.

libraryWalkFileClosed

void libraryWalkFileClosed()
Called for each walked file after the file has been closed. This call is normally paired with libraryWalkStarted.

libraryWalkFinished

void libraryWalkFinished()
Called once when a walk is finished

debug

void debug(java.lang.String s)
Called when a debug message is issued

Parameters:
s - the text of the debug message
